Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this paper we aim to draw to the fact that caution is needed when prescribing vitamin A - containing drugs to women of childbearing years .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| vitamin A |

The chemical entity in the paragraph is "vitamin A". It is a fat-soluble vitamin that is essential for human health. It is found in many foods and is also available as a dietary supplement. In the context of the paragraph, vitamin A is mentioned as a component of certain drugs that may be prescribed to women of childbearing age.

| vitamin A |

The only chemical entity in the paragraph is "vitamin A". The phrase "drugs" is not a chemical entity because it is a general term that can refer to a wide variety of substances, including both chemicals and non-chemicals. In this case, "drugs" is used as a general term to refer to medications that may contain vitamin A, so it does not refer to a specific chemical entity.
